assignments.name: endDate
assignments.value: ={{ DateTime.fromISO($json.start ?? $('Get Default Start Date').item.json.startDate, { zone: 'UTC' }).setZone($('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.user.time_zone).plus({ days: 3 }).toISO({ suppressMilliseconds: true }) }}

assignments.name: message
assignments.value: There was an error. Try later.

task.draft_response: Hey Jesus, can you check out the failed workflow in n8n using the execution URL to see what's causing the out-of-memory issue?
task.description_extended: Investigate the high-priority failure of the "Extract Links" workflow in n8n, focusing on the possible out-of-memory issue that halted execution at the "Extract Link and App" node; review the provided execution URL for diagnostic details and report findings promptly.
